title: The Afterlife Frequency - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/12/21
itunes:title: The Afterlife Frequency - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/12/21
description:
George Noory and psychic medium Mark Anthony discuss his theories on communicating with the spirits of the deceased, how many people see spirits of dead loved ones during near death experiences, and whether these visions may only be creations of the brain.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
